# datapower_mqmanager (Data Source)

IBM MQ v9+ queue manager

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_mqmanager" "test" {
  depends_on = [datapower_mqmanager.test]
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
}
```
